title: Big LP gain outcomes?
body:
Hey all.
So I finished up my placements a few days ago and landed in Plat 3 (previously Dia 5 with ehh MMR), now I am Plat 1. I've been gaining a good amount of LP and just then in a Plat 1 game I gained +37. I've never gotten this much LP before but I'm just curious, if I get into Dia 5 with around these LP gains (30+?), will I be eligible for a division skip? 

Not exactly sure how they work but I remember when smurfing, I was able to skip through some divisions in Silver/Gold with around 30+ LP gains.

Thanks!

replies.body: I think division skipping is only possible below plat.

The only way I have seen a division skip is when you win all your games and your first 2 promotion series matches or 3 of you are going into a new tier, but other than that the LP gains dont mean you will be skipping any divisions.
Eventually yes you will skip a division, on this smurf account i completely skipped promos to gold, you keep winning and the system sees that you don't belong where you are so it skips you, MMR op.

Probably. I was getting +28 and jumped a division before.

Keep winning and find out.
